title: US/EU Interventionism in the Balkans - Critical Source Library
description:
This small collection of books represents an attempt to address the scarcity of critical English-language literature dealing with the international aspects of the 1990:s conflicts in the former Yugoslavia, specifically the politics of interventionism by USA, the EU and NATO as their common military arm in the region.

More than a decade later, the wars in the former Yugoslavia are as relevant as ever in light of subsequent wars and events that have taken place, from the invasion of Iraq in 2003 to the events in Crimea. Many of these subsequent events represent the logical unfolding of decisions taken and post-Cold War policies inaugurated during the conflicts of the 1990:s in the former Yugoslavia, and yet these are conflicts that are among the least understood and the most frequently misrepresented in mainstream media...


NOTE: This is an updated version of the old torrent with the same name. This time I've added one more book to the collection
